long_description: The Spark R&D Tesla 2nd Board kit lets you switch your Spark R&D splitboard bindings featuring the Telsa system between two boards. This kit includes Tesla brackets, heel plates, and screws. You will also need the Voile Pucks to complete the mounting platform, sold separately. Compatible with the Spark R&D Afterburner and Magneto splitboard bindings, sold separately.
short_description: The Spark R&D Tesla 2nd Board kit lets you switch your Spark R&D splitboard bindings featuring the Telsa system between two boards. This kit includes Tesla brackets, heel plates, and screws.
